title: Isolate

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, expend up to two charges of cut down. For each charge expended, attack a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with 2 charges of cut down. Gain a charge whenever a good player is hanged.
- If your attack does not kill your target, none of the targets you choose are killed tonight, and you lose all charges.
- Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.

desc:
Post 4826
*Go away! You have until the count of three!*
